amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Department of Homeland Security's Office of Inspector General.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in part B of House Report 109-84 to increase funding for the Department of Homeland Security's Office of Inspector General to $200 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meek (FL) amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 244 (Roll no. 183).
